date: Thu Mar 31 2022 23:11:24 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)
keywords: Mt Disappointment,Mount Disappointment,helicopter crash,helicopter crash mt disappointment,helicopter crash today,mount disappointment helicopter crash
description: Helicopter company Microflite was operating the two flights, which were bound for Ulupna Island in northern Victoria. Two helicopters were flying north from Melbourne's CBD over Mount Disappointment when one disappeared just after 9am. Police spotted the missing helicopter from the air about 11:45am and reached the wreckage on foot later in the afternoon. The second helicopter landed safely at Mangalore Airport with four passengers and two staff.
metaDescription: TabDroid created this image about a pilot and his four passengers who were found dead after a helicopter crashed in dense bushland at Mount Disappointment, 80km north of Melbourne.

topicText:
Five dead in helicopter crash site near Mt Disappointment
Police have confirmed everyone on board the aircraft perished when the helicopter crashed in rugged terrain north of Melbourne on Thursday.
Five killed in helicopter crash at Mount Disappointment, north of ...
The helicopter was flying in a convoy of two from Melbourne's CBD when it crashed at Mount Disappointment after 9am, killing four passengers and the pilot.
Five confirmed dead in tragic helicopter crash
A pilot and his four passengers were found dead after a helicopter crashed in dense bushland at Mount Disappointment, 80km north of Melbourne.
Helicopter with five people onboard crashes near Melbourne in ...
Two helicopters were travelling north in convoy from Melbourne's CBD over Mount Disappointment when one aircraft reportedly disappeared just after 9.30am.
Helicopter crash at Mt Disappointment north of Whittlesea - The ...
Police believe a pilot and four passengers were on board the aircraft. Specialist search and rescue police officers accessed the site via a police helicopter at ...
Mt Disappointment helicopter crash: Five dead in Victorian chopper ...
Five people have been killed in a horrific helicopter crash in Victoria. The helicopter disappeared near Mount Disappointment north of Melbourne around 9am ...
Missing helicopter wreckage found near Mt Disapointment after ...
Five people are confirmed to have died in a helicopter crash in dense Victorian bushland.
